text: Canke umwe yarema Amajuru n’Isi nukuba manurira amazi avuye mubicu no kuri ivyo twaranagishije imirima iteye igomwe, namwe ntabushobozi mufise bwukunagisha ibi biti, mbega hoba hari uwundi muremyi hamwe n’Imana rugira vyose, rero abo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri n’abantu batari kumurongo ugororotse
